title: BlazeCast Plugin
description: Self-hosted WebSocket server for CakePHP applications that implements the Pusher protocol. Enables real-time bidirectional communication with support for public, private, and presence channels, Redis PubSub for horizontal scaling, and seamless integration with Pusher JavaScript libraries and Laravel Echo.
name: BlazeCast

title: MercureBroadcasting Plugin
description: Mercure broadcaster driver for the CakePHP Broadcasting plugin. Provides Server-Sent Events (SSE) based broadcasting using the Mercure protocol.
name: MercureBroadcasting

title: Temporal Plugin
description: Workflow orchestration for CakePHP applications using Temporal. Build distributed, scalable, durable, and highly available workflows for asynchronous long-running business logic in microservice architectures.
name: Temporal

title: OpenRouter Plugin
description: Easy-to-use interface for integrating OpenRouter into CakePHP applications. Unified interface for Large Language Models with type-safe DTOs for all API interactions including chat completions, streaming, tool calling, and more.
name: OpenRouter

title: PluginManifest Plugin
description: Plugin asset installation and publishing system for CakePHP 5.x. Standardized mechanism for plugins to distribute optional assets including configuration files, migrations, templates, and bootstrap code with smart duplicate detection.
name: PluginManifest

title: BatchQueue Plugin
description: Advanced job coordination system for CakePHP Queue. Handle parallel batches, sequential chains, saga compensation patterns, and dynamic workflow execution with proper failure handling.
name: BatchQueue

title: Broadcasting Plugin
description: Real-time broadcasting system for CakePHP applications. WebSocket support, event broadcasting, and real-time communication with multiple driver support.
name: Broadcasting

title: BroadcastingNotification Plugin
description: Integrated notification and broadcasting system combining real-time messaging with notification delivery for comprehensive communication solutions.
name: BroadcastingNotification

title: Notification Plugin
description: Comprehensive notification system for CakePHP applications. Send emails, SMS, push notifications, and in-app alerts with flexible delivery channels and templating.
name: Notification

title: NotificationUI Plugin
description: User interface components for notification management. Create beautiful notification displays, modals, and interactive notification centers.
name: NotificationUI

title: RocketChatNotification Plugin
description: Seamless integration with RocketChat for team notifications. Send messages, alerts, and updates directly to RocketChat channels and users.
name: RocketChatNotification

title: SevenNotification Plugin
description: SMS notification service integration using the 7SMS API. Send text messages and SMS alerts to users with reliable delivery tracking.
name: SevenNotification
